metadata.title: CVE-2023-1521 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: On Linux the sccache client can execute arbitrary code with the privilegesof a local sccache server, by preloading the code in a shared librarypassed to LD_PRELOAD.If the server is run as root (which is the default when installing thesnap package https://snapcraft.io/sccache ), this means a user running thesccache client can get root privileges.

criterions.comment: sccache package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
